title: My In-laws Are Obsessed With Me - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Complex Family Relationships   Contracts   Curses   Cute Story   Divorce   European Ambience   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience   Mysterious Family Background   Nightmares   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Tragic Past   Tsundere
author: 한윤설
description:
My family and my husband killed me. Because of the inheritance.

Returning to the past, I made up my mind.

“I have to protect my life and my inheritance.”

Grand Duke Lapireon of the cursed family. I offered him, who was not interested in property and women, a one year contract marriage.

Now, all we have to do is get a divorce…

“Lady, do you think you can leave me now?”

My husband is weird.

“Would you like a land or a mine? Or an empire?”

“Sasha, did Theo do something wrong?”

“Mom, don’t leave me.”

“Sister… I can’t live without you.”

Even my in-laws began to obsess over me.>
